testcase.name: The default mode is Grid

failure.message: failed The default mode is Grid

testcase.failure:
Scenario: The default mode is Grid
Given I am on the home page And I search for term "dan brown" Then I should have a result page with term "dan brown" matching Given the result is displayed in Grid mode
Message:
expected to find text "Dan Brown" in "Ireland Dr. Terence Brown £4.49 Rogue Forces Dale Brown £4.99 Strike Force Dale Brown £4.71 Sandstealers Ben Brown £2.99 Jim Brown Mike Freeman £5.99 Shadow Command Dale Brown £5.99" (RSpec::Expectations::ExpectationNotMetError) ./features/step_definitions/search_steps.rb:7:in `/^I should have a result page with term "(.*?)" matching$/' features/search/search_result_display.feature:14:in `Then I should have a result page with term "dan brown" matching'

testcase.name: Check the sort options are present and accessible
Switch from Grid mode to List mode
Switch back from List mode to Grid mode
Check the number of return result is equal on both modes - Grid and List mode
Check in the list mode for club card link/text details
Search for a word that does not return any results
When user selects List view mode to display search results it should be set as default
Default search results view is always kept to Grid view unless user changes to list view
